name: recultivation, ilmenite mine | recultivation, ilmenite mine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7971/documentation

Recultivation of limestone mine is used as a proxy for this dataset.The ratio of topsoil (assumed density: 1'400 kg/m3, thickness: 0.3 m, weight: 420 kg/m2, ) to extracted ilmenite is about 0.26%. The diesel fuel used for covering the closed mine is thus calculated using this ratio compared to its requirement during operation of the mine.



includes only transformation from mineral extraction site to forest and the diesel consumption.
